quote: In Gym, the kids on my team learned not to pass me the ball and to step quickly in front of me if the other team tried to take advantage of my weakness. I happily stayed out of their way.
quote_letters: IN GYM THE KIDS ON MY TEAM LEARNED NOT TO PASS ME THE BALL AND TO STEP QUICKLY IN FRONT OF ME IF THE OTHER TEAM TRIED TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF MY WEAKNESS I HAPPILY STAYED OUT OF THEIR WAY
